name: hallway (TheChatotMaestro)
description:
walk down a hall and read other people's secrets

---

Game Jams: 4

  • Make 10 Short Games Variety Megajam (Jam that inspired me to do a 'make as much shit as possible and submit it to as many jams as possible at once because life is short and winter break is shorter' challenge.)
  • Not A Game Game Jam (Admittedly it's tame as far as non games go but I'm working on better entries.)
  • Art Is Ego Game Jam (This counts because I say it does, and as far as I know 'being a pretentious asshole in the description' is the only rule to qualify. I did playtest it to try and turn off the left button, I hope this doesn't get me kicked out of the club.)
  • Two Buttons Game Jam (Right to walk right, z to interact. Note: it's actually a three-button game- I figured out how to turn off every other button, but you can still walk left. You can solve this problem by simply not walking left. I also started making this before this specific jam started, but that's okay because I do whatever I want. It only took like three hours total anyway. Two of them were spent puzzling over how to make you not able to walk left. I gave up.)

If you are running a jam and have an issue with me submitting weird stuff have you tried not doing that. I would make this one playable in the browser but it would fuck up the ending. Also it might break your browser I haven't tested it and I don't want to. if you want to play this on linux, it will cost money
